CS:GO is more addictive than heroin and the skins cost just as much. If you haven't played CS:GO yet please don't, it will just waste countless hours of your life that would be better spent doing something productive, like making clam dip.
CS:GO is a fun game that will provide you will many hours of fun and enjoyment, you just have to be wary of all the salty and toxic players that you might encounter on your gameplay.
